/*PLEASE DO NOT EDIT THIS CODE*/
/*This code was generated using the UMPLE @UMPLE_VERSION@ modeling language!*/

package example;

public class Student
{

  //------------------------
  // MEMBER VARIABLES
  //------------------------

  //Student Attributes
  private String number;

  //Student Associations
  private Mentor mentor;

  //Helper Variables
  private boolean canSetNumber;
  private boolean canSetMentor;

  //------------------------
  // CONSTRUCTOR
  //------------------------

  public Student(String aNumber, Mentor aMentor)
  {
    number = aNumber;
    canSetNumber = false;
    canSetMentor = true;
    if (!setMentor(aMentor))
    {
      throw new RuntimeException("Unable to create Student due to aMentor");
    }
  }

  //------------------------
  // INTERFACE
  //------------------------

  public String getNumber()
  {
    return number;
  }

  public Mentor getMentor()
  {
    return mentor;
  }

  private boolean setMentor(Mentor newMentor)
  {
    boolean wasSet = false;
    if (!canSetMentor) { return wasSet; }
    canSetMentor = false;

    if (newMentor != null)
    {
      mentor = newMentor;
      wasSet = true;
    }
    return wasSet;
  }

  public void delete()
  {}

}
